description:
Conan and Kogoro pass by a dreary shopping center. They attempt to purchase some things at a vegetable shop, but the owner, Yamazaki, seems listless. Just then, Madam Gaga, a producer who revitalizes run down shopping centers, and her assistant Rabbit Suzuki show up. Madam Gaga announces that a pro wrestling event will be held to revitalize the shopping center. The shop owners engage in various forms of exercise to train, and Kogoro agrees to participate in the event as a referee, but...
Source: crunchyroll
